snippet: Santa Monica College met with vigorous student objections, and some people at a recent protest were hurt by pepper spray from the campus police.
abstract: Santa Monica College cancels plan to offer certain popular courses at higher prices, after a week of student protests and a request from the chancellor of the California community college system.
lead_paragraph: Santa Monica College met with vigorous student objections, and some people at a recent protest were hurt by pepper spray from the campus police.

headline.seo: California College Drops Plan for 2-Level Course Pricing
headline.main: California College Postpones Plan to Charge Much More for Some Popular Courses
headline.print_headline: California College Postpones Plan to Charge Much More for Some Popular Courses
